name: Couples trainer 0.0.7 [Add Truth or Dare, Femdom guide]
name_original: Couples trainer 0.0.7 [Add Truth or Dare, Femdom guide]
description:
Overview:
Сouples trainer is a game for couples in which you play together with your girlfriend or wife.
At the moment, the game has a large number of mini-games for couples that allow you to diversify and improve your relationship

According to the poll, over 500 votes were cast for the Femdom guide, I hope you enjoy it Thank you for sharing your opinion on the game and supporting me. :)

- New menu interface on Couples trainer

- Femdom guide with 22 steps

- Add "Truth or dare game" click to button

- Animations and illustrations load faster now

PC: MEGA - GDRIVE - MEDIAFIRE - ZIPPYSHARE - ITCH.IO

Next Update:

- BlowJ guide (The work is 90% complete, it is necessary to make animations and pictures)

- Bdsm guide with green/yellow/red list to fill out

- Change video in “Sex tasks

- Roleplay scripts for Couples

- What you choose in the next vote, the votes of my patrons, take precedence even if there is a ratio of 500 to 1, i cannot ignore the people who support me
